title: BRIEF-Aguia Resources Granted Preliminary License For Development Of Três Estrades Phosphate Project
text:
BRIEF-Aguia Resources Granted Preliminary License For Development Of Três Estrades Phosphate Project

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 10:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Aguia Resources Granted Preliminary License For Development Of Três Estrades Phosphate Project Oct 17 (Reuters) - Aguia Resources Ltd : * AGUIA RESOURCES LTD - GRANTED PRELIMINARY LICENSE FOR DEVELOPMENT OF TRÊS ESTRADES PHOSPHATE PROJECT IN SOUTHERN BRAZIL * AGUIA RESOURCES LTD - PRELIMINARY LICENSE GRANTED AFTER APPROVAL OF ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT ASSESSMENT BY RIO GRANDE DO SUL STATE ENVIRONMENTAL AGENCY
